TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MediaElement extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class MediaElement Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IUriContext
public ref class MediaElement : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type MediaElement = class inherit FrameworkElement interface IUriContext

summary.span: 代表包含音訊和/或視訊的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that contains audio and/or video.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在隨著您的應用程式散發媒體時，您無法使用媒體檔案做為專案資源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在您的專案檔中，您必須改為將媒體類型設定為 `Content`，並將 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 設定為 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可用於兩種不同模式的詳細資訊，取決於驅使控制項： 獨立模式或時鐘模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the control: independent mode or clock mode. 在獨立模式中，使用時相當於映像，並[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]也可以直接指定。When used in the independent mode, the is analogous to an image, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] can be directly specified. 在時鐘模式中，可以視為目標的動畫，並因此會有相對應和計時樹狀結構中的項目。In clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the timing tree. 如需有關媒體模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[多媒體概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md). 如需範例，控制在獨立模式中，請參閱[How to:控制 MediaElement （播放、 暫停、 停止、 音量及速度）](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed.md)。For an example of controlling a in independent mode, see [How to: Control a MediaElement (Play, Pause, Stop, Volume, and Speed)](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed.md). 直到引發的事件，和的控制項將會報告任何媒體內容是用來判斷控制項位置的最終大小。Until the event has been raised, the and of the control will report as zero as the media content is used to determine the final size and location of the control. 如需音訊的唯一內容，這些屬性一律為零。For audio only content, these properties will always be zero. 固定的大小的控制項，如及/或可以設定屬性。For a fixed size control, the and/or properties can be set. 不過，若要維持媒體的外觀比例，將或屬性，但非兩者。However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the or properties but not both.

summary.span: 取得或設定所有喇叭的音量比例。

span.span: Gets or sets a ratio of volume across speakers.

value.span: 左右喇叭的音量比率，範圍介於 -1 和 1 之間。

span.span: The ratio of volume across speakers in the range between -1 and 1.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為-1 代表 100%的左邊算的起的主講人和右邊喇叭的 1 代表 100%。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性可放媒體項目的模式，它會利用計時引擎。Setting this property puts the media element into a mode in which it utilizes the timing engine. 停止任何先前已播放的媒體和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]聯新時鐘會開啟。Any media that was previously playing is stopped and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] associated with the new clock is opened.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 在目前的位置暫停媒體。

span.span: Pauses media at the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果媒體目前正在執行，這個方法就會暫停媒體。This method pauses the media if the media is currently running. 方法可用來繼續。The method can be used to resume. 可以使用這個方法時，才屬性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，計時引擎會控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 這個方法沒有效果才屬性設定為。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Play() cil managed

summary.span: 從目前的位置開始播放媒體。

span.span: Plays media from the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法將會開始在媒體，如果不是目前作用中，或繼續已暫停的媒體。This method will begin the media if it is not currently active or resume media if it is paused. 如果媒體目前正在執行，這個方法沒有任何作用。This method has no effect if the media is currently running. 可以使用這個方法時，才屬性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，計時引擎會控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 這個方法沒有效果才屬性設定為。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Position { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Position : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定媒體播放時間進度的目前位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.

value.span: 自媒體開始播放後的時間量。

span.span: The amount of time since the beginning of the media.
The default is 00:00:00.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性可以讓您跳到播放 （也稱為搜尋） 中的不同點。Setting this property can enable you to jump to different points in playback (also known as seeking). 並非所有的媒體類型可讓搜尋作業。Not all media types allow seek operations. 如果媒體來源不允許搜尋，會引發事件。The event will fire if the media source does not allow seeking. 這個屬性沒有任何作用直到之後事件已發生。This property has no effect until after the event has occurred. 這個屬性可以設定時，才屬性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，計時引擎會控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.

span.span: The property is not .

member this.ScrubbingEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 是否會在暫停時更新框架以進行搜尋作業。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the will update frames for seek operations while paused.

value.span: 如果框架於暫停時更新，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if frames are updated while paused; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`false`、 搜尋特定的位置將只更新顯示的畫面格，如果在播放媒體。When set to `false`, seeking to a specific location will only update the displayed frame if media is playing. 設定至`true`會造成稍微降低效能，尤其是當以互動方式控制媒體播放。Setting to `true` can incur some performance costs, especially when interactively controlling media playback. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定 上的媒體來源。

span.span: Gets or sets a media source on the .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the source of the element.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性的值會導致要播放的媒體。Setting the value of this property causes the media to play. 這個屬性可以設定時，才屬性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，計時引擎會控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , |

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SpeedRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定媒體的速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the speed ratio of the media.
The speed ratio of the media.

value.span: 有效範圍介於 0 (零) 與無限大之間。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 (zero) and infinity.

value.span: 小於 1 的值會產生比正常播放還要慢的速度，而大於 1 的值則會產生比正常播放還要快的速度。

span.span: Values less than 1 yield slower than normal playback, and values greater than 1 yield faster than normal playback.
Negative values are treated as 0.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定時，才屬性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，計時引擎會控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 音訊播放不發生，除非值為 1。Audio playback may not occur unless the value of is 1.

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止並重新設定從一開始播放媒體。

span.span: Stops and resets media to be played from the beginning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用這個方法時，才屬性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，計時引擎會控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 這個方法沒有效果才屬性設定為。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .
